title: Moqueca de Frango (Brazilian Chicken Stew)
description: A creamy, mildly spiced Brazilian chicken stew with coconut milk.

ingredients.name: Boneless chicken thighs or breast, cut into chunks

steps: Marinate the chicken: Toss the chicken with lime juice, salt, black pepper, and paprika. Let it sit for 10 minutes.
Sauté the aromatics: Heat olive oil in a large pan, add the sliced onion and minced garlic, and cook until fragrant.
Cook the chicken: Add the marinated chicken pieces and cook until lightly browned.
Add veggies & simmer: Stir in the sliced bell pepper, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, and cayenne pepper. Let it simmer for 10 minutes.
Make it creamy: Pour in the coconut milk, stir well, and simmer for another 5 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Finish & serve: Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve hot over white rice or with crusty bread.
